rainfalls: As of today, there is no Heavy Rainfall Warning Issued.
thunderstorms:
Thunderstorm Advisory No. 24 #NCR_PRSD

Issued at: 10:00 PM, 27 June 2025(Friday)



Moderate to heavy rainshowers with lightning and strong winds are expected over Nueva Ecija, Pampanga, Tarlac, Zambales, Bataan, Metro Manila and Cavite within the next 3 hours.



The above conditions are being experienced in Bulacan(Dona Remedios Trinidad, Norzagaray, San Jose del Monte), Rizal(Rodriguez), Quezon(Polillo, Calauag) and Laguna(Pangil) which may persist within 2 hours and may affect nearby areas.



All are advised to take precautionary measures against the impacts associated with these hazards which include flash floods and landslides.



Keep monitoring for updates.
